description: This table contains the items for dental procedure records.

columns.name: FINDING_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the finding record

columns.name: DENTAL_EAP_ID
columns.description: Reference to the associated dental procedure record

columns.name: DENTAL_COMP_INST_DTTM
columns.description: Date and time dental procedure was completed

columns.name: DENTAL_PROC_STAT_C_NAME
columns.description:
Current status of the dental procedure


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Planned


Completed


Canceled


Planning


Discontinued

columns.name: DENTAL_PROC_ARCH_C_NAME
columns.description:
Identifies which arch the dental procedure is for.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Upper


Lower

columns.name: DENTAL_QUADRANT_C_NAME
columns.description:
Identifies which quadrant the dental procedure is for.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Upper Right


Upper Left


Lower Left


Lower Right

columns.name: DENTAL_PROCEDURE_SEQUENCE
columns.description: This column tracks the sequence of dental procedures within a visit.

columns.name: DENTAL_PROC_VISIT_ID
columns.description: Identifies the visit in which a dental procedure is planned to be completed.

columns.name: DENTAL_COMP_PROV_ID
columns.description: This column contains the provider that completed the dental procedure based on the service provider of the charge.

columns.name: DEN_PROC_EX_FLAG_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether a procedure existed as part of the patient's presenting condition.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: DENTAL_TOOTH_AREA_C_NAME
columns.description:
This determines the part of the tooth that a procedure or finding affects.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Root


Surface


Crown


Full Tooth

columns.name: DENT_PLAN_VISIT_NUM
columns.description: Identifies the visit number that a procedure is being planned for.

columns.name: DENTAL_BILL_PROV_ID
columns.description: This column contains the billing provider for a completed dental procedure which can be different from the service (completing) provider.

columns.name: DENT_PLAN_PRL_ID
columns.description: Stores the treatment template that will be used when the user creates a treatment plan for the dental procedure

columns.name: DENT_PLAN_PRL_ID_PROTOCOL_NAME
columns.description: The SmartSet/Protocol record name.  This is different from the display name, which is stored in CL_PRL_SS_OT.DISPLAY_NAME.

columns.name: DENT_PROC_BY_RULE_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether a procedure is added by auto-treatment planning rule.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: DEN_PROC_EX_FLAG_YN

columns.name: DENTAL_PROC_IMP_ID
columns.description: Stores implant record ID linked to a dental procedure.

columns.name: DENTAL_PROSTH_ID
columns.description: Stores the unique identifier for a multi-tooth prosthetic structure. This is only used in Finland.

columns.name: DENTAL_PROC_AREA_C_NAME
columns.description:
Specifies the area of the oral cavity that a dental procedure is performed on.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Entire oral cavity


Maxillary arch


Mandibular arch


Upper right quadrant


Upper left quadrant


Lower left quadrant


Lower right quadrant

columns.name: DENTAL_LNKED_ORD_ID
columns.description: This column contains the linked order record for a dental procedure.

columns.name: DENTAL_PROC_NOTE_ID
columns.description: ID of the note (HNO) record that serves as this dental procedure's Completion Details note

columns.name: DENTAL_TRIG_PROC_ID
columns.description: The original triggering procedure for alternatives

columns.name: DENT_PROC_SUBSTATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
Subcategorization of a dental procedure


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: DENTAL_LINKED_BRIDGE_PROC
columns.description: The procedure (RES) ID that indicates which bridge this dental procedure forms a part of. All of the procedures that are in the same bridge have the same value for this column.

columns.name: DEN_SRC_PROTOCOL_ID
columns.description: The SmartSet this result came from

columns.name: DEN_SRC_PROTOCOL_ID_PROTOCOL_NAME
columns.description: The SmartSet/Protocol record name.  This is different from the display name, which is stored in CL_PRL_SS_OT.DISPLAY_NAME.

columns.name: D_SS_PRL_SRC_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Result came from PRL OrderSet, PRL SmartSet, or PRL Template


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


ORDER SET


SMARTSET


QUICK LIST


Dental Template

columns.name: DENT_SRC_PRL_DAT
columns.description: The DAT of the SmartSet as applied to the patient

columns.name: DENT_PROC_AREA_INACTIVE_YN
columns.description:
Determines if a non-tooth level procedure should be considered active and displayed on tooth chart


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: DEN_PROC_EX_FLAG_YN

columns.name: DENT_PRL_INST_DTTM
columns.description: The Instant the Procedure was created from a PRL template
